medium: Cotton, rayon; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
description: Two panel huipil with slit neck opening; red ground cloth; brocaded design dominates upper half of garment in a rayed diamond pattern in orange, red, green, blue and purple set in a modified trellis design.
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
